description: T.1 Beech - Fell (Significant decay due to Ganoderma Bracket on main stem half way up tree).G.2 Cherry x4 - Fell (One dead, others suppressed & too close to building, in decline & with significant deadwood.T.3 Cedar - Fell (Young tree, in poor health weeping, leaning and suppressed).T.4 Robinia - Fell (suppressing protected trees on boundary).T.5 Apple - Fell (dead).T.6 Sycamore - Deadwood.T.7 Horse Chestnut - Deadwood.T.8 Sycamore - Reduce length of lowest South East branch by 2m reducing end weight due to cavity on northern stem & deadwood.T.9 Horse Chestnut - Deadwood.T.10 Holly - Fell (dead).
